name: Signal Interception
description: Techniques for monitoring electronic communications and gathering intelligence from digital sources.

cards.title: Cell Phone Interception & Tracking
cards.description: Using advanced techniques to monitor and track mobile communications.
bulletpoints: Deploy IMSI catchers for call interception
Decrypt encrypted communications using AI models

cards.title: Wiretap Methods & Digital Monitoring
cards.description: Legally and covertly placing wiretaps on targets under surveillance.
bulletpoints: Use fiber optic taps for real-time data access
Employ passive and active wiretaps for different use cases
Manage encryption protocols to bypass security layers
